page.title: 17Churches continued
page.content: The St.Thomas More Roman Catholic Church was the first church in the world to be named after St.Thomas More. The modern building was built in 1962 and its east window contains a large engraved glass figure of St.Thomas More. The Golden Jubilee of the Parish of St.Thomas More took place on 7th July 1985. This Mass was conducted by Cardinal Basil Hume. Canon Harold Windstone is the Parish Priest. The United Reformed Church was built in 1887. The church is usually kept locked except when services are being held. This is because damage has been caused by vandals in the past. The present Minister is the Reverend Gordon Bellamy. He is the Chairman of the Board of Governors of Knebworth Primary School. He often takes the School assembly.
